00228 void MainWindow::FinishManipulation( )
00229 {
00230         QModelIndex currentIndex = sceneModelView->currentIndex();
00231         SoBaseKit* coinNode = static_cast< SoBaseKit* >( m_sceneModel->NodeFromIndex(currentIndex)->GetNode() );
00232 
00233         SoTransform* nodeTransform = static_cast< SoTransform* >( coinNode->getPart( "transform", true ) );
00234 
00235         QUndoCommand* command = new QUndoCommand();
00236 
00237         QString translationValue = QString( "%1 %2 %3" ).arg( QString::number( nodeTransform->translation.getValue()[0] ),
00238                                                                                                                 QString::number( nodeTransform->translation.getValue()[1] ),
00239                                                                                                                 QString::number( nodeTransform->translation.getValue()[2] ) );
00240         new CmdModifyParameter( nodeTransform, QString( "translation" ), translationValue, m_sceneModel, command );
00241         m_commandStack->push( command );
00242 
00243         m_sceneModel->UpdateSceneModel();
00244         m_document->SetDocumentModified( true );
00245 
00246 }

00251 void MainWindow::StartManipulation( SoDragger* dragger )
00252 {
00253         SoSearchAction* coinSearch = new SoSearchAction();
00254         coinSearch->setNode( dragger );
00255         coinSearch->setInterest( SoSearchAction::FIRST);
00256 
00257         coinSearch->apply( m_graphicsRoot->GetNode() );
00258 
00259         SoPath* coinScenePath = coinSearch->getPath( );
00260         if( !coinScenePath ) tgf::SevereError( "PathFromIndex Null coinScenePath." );
00261 
00262         SoNodeKitPath* nodePath = static_cast< SoNodeKitPath* > ( coinScenePath );
00263         if( !nodePath ) tgf::SevereError( "PathFromIndex Null nodePath." );
00264 
00265 
00266         nodePath->truncate(nodePath->getLength()-1 );
00267         SoBaseKit* coinNode =  static_cast< SoBaseKit* > ( nodePath->getTail() );
00268 
00269         QModelIndex nodeIndex = m_sceneModel->IndexFromPath( *nodePath );
00270         m_selectionModel->setCurrentIndex( nodeIndex , QItemSelectionModel::ClearAndSelect );
00271 
00272         SoNode* manipulator = coinNode->getPart( "transform", true );
00273         m_manipulators_Buffer = new QStringList();
00274 
00275         SoFieldList fieldList;
00276     int totalFields = manipulator->getFields( fieldList );
00277 
00278     SoField* pField = 0;
00279     SbName fieldName;
00280     SbString fieldValue = "null";
00281 
00282 
00283         for( int index = 0; index < totalFields; ++index )
00284         {
00285                 pField = fieldList.get( index );
00286                 if( pField )
00287                 {
00288 
00289                 pField->get( fieldValue );
00290                         m_manipulators_Buffer->push_back(QString( fieldValue.getString() ) );
00291                 }
00292         }
00293         delete coinSearch;
00294 }

00299 void MainWindow::DefineSunLight()
00300 {
00301         TSceneKit* coinScene = m_document->GetSceneKit();
00302         if( !coinScene ) return;
00303 
00304         InstanceNode* sceneInstance = m_sceneModel->NodeFromIndex( sceneModelView->rootIndex() );
00305         InstanceNode* concentratorRoot = sceneInstance->children[ sceneInstance->children.size() -1 ];
00306         m_selectionModel->setCurrentIndex( m_sceneModel->IndexFromNodeUrl( concentratorRoot->GetNodeURL() ), QItemSelectionModel::ClearAndSelect );
00307 
00308         TLightKit* currentLight = 0;
00309         if( coinScene->getPart( "lightList[0]", false ) )       currentLight = static_cast< TLightKit* >( coinScene->getPart( "lightList[0]", false ) );
00310 
00311         QVector< TShapeFactory* > shapeFactoryList = m_pluginManager->GetShapeFactories();
00312 
00313         QVector< TShapeFactory* > tFlatShapeFactoryList;
00314         for( int i = 0; i < shapeFactoryList.size(); ++i  )
00315                 if( shapeFactoryList[i]->IsFlat() )     tFlatShapeFactoryList<<shapeFactoryList[i];
00316 
00317         QVector< TSunShapeFactory* > tSunShapeFactoryList = m_pluginManager->GetSunShapeFactories();
00318 
00319         LightDialog dialog( currentLight, tSunShapeFactoryList );
00320         if( dialog.exec() )
00321         {
00322 
00323                 TLightKit* lightKit = dialog.GetTLightKit();
00324                 if( !lightKit ) return;
00325 
00326                 lightKit->setName( "Light" );
00327 
00328                 CmdLightKitModified* command = new CmdLightKitModified( lightKit, coinScene, *m_sceneModel );
00329                 m_commandStack->push( command );
00330 
00331                 //UpdateLightDimensions();
00332                 m_sceneModel->UpdateSceneModel();
00333 
00334                 parametersView->UpdateView();
00335                 m_document->SetDocumentModified( true );
00336 
00337                 actionCalculateSunPosition->setEnabled( true );
00338 
00339         }
00340 }

00412         if( !dialog.exec() )    return;

00415         //      coinScene->setPart( "transmissivity", newTransmissivity );
00416 
00417         CmdTransmissivityModified* command = new CmdTransmissivityModified( newTransmissivity, coinScene );
00418         if ( m_commandStack ) m_commandStack->push( command );
00419     m_document->SetDocumentModified( true );
00420

00469 void MainWindow::ExportPhotonMap()
00470 {
00471         if ( m_photonMap == NULL )
00472         {
00473                 QMessageBox::information( this, "Tonatiuh", "No Photon Map stored", 1 );
00474             return;
00475         }
00476 
00477         ExportDialog exportDialog( *m_sceneModel, m_lastExportSurfaceUrl, m_lastExportInGlobal, m_lastExportFileName, this );
00478         if( !exportDialog.exec() ) return;
00479 
00480         QString fileName = exportDialog.GetExportFileName();
00481         if( fileName.isEmpty() )
00482         {
00483                 QMessageBox::information( this, "Tonatiuh", "No file defined to save Photon Map", 1 );
00484                 return;
00485         }
00486 
00487         int okExport;
00488         if( exportDialog.ExportAllPhotonMap() ) okExport = ExportAllPhotonMap( fileName );
00489         else
00490         {
00491                 QString nodeURL = exportDialog.GetSelectedSurface();
00492                 if( nodeURL.isEmpty() )
00493                 {
00494                         QMessageBox::warning( this, "Tonatiuh", "Selected node in not a valid export node." );
00495                         return;
00496                 }
00497                 okExport = ExportPhotonMap( fileName, nodeURL, exportDialog.ExportPhotonsInGlobal() );
00498 
00499         }
00500         if( !okExport )
00501         {
00502                 QMessageBox::warning( this, "Tonatiuh", "An unexpected error has occurred exporting photon map to a file." );
00503                 return;
00504         }
00505 
00506 }

00513 void MainWindow::InsertUserDefinedComponent()
00514 {
00515         QModelIndex parentIndex;
00516          if (( !sceneModelView->currentIndex().isValid() ) || ( sceneModelView->currentIndex() == sceneModelView->rootIndex() ) )
00517                  parentIndex = m_sceneModel->index (0,0,sceneModelView->rootIndex());
00518          else
00519                  parentIndex = sceneModelView->currentIndex();
00520 
00521         SoNode* coinNode = m_sceneModel->NodeFromIndex( parentIndex )->GetNode();
00522 
00523         if ( !coinNode->getTypeId().isDerivedFrom( TSeparatorKit::getClassTypeId() ) ) return;
00524 
00525         QString fileName = QFileDialog::getOpenFileName( this,
00526                                                        tr( "Open Tonatiuh document" ), ".",
00527                                                        tr( "Tonatiuh component (*.tcmp)" ) );
00528 
00529         if ( fileName.isEmpty() ) return;
00530 
00531         InsertFileComponent( fileName );
00532 }
00533 
00537 void MainWindow::ItemDragAndDrop( const QModelIndex& newParent, const QModelIndex& node)
00538 {
00539         if( node == sceneModelView->rootIndex() ) return;
00540 
00541 
00542         InstanceNode* nodeInstnace = m_sceneModel->NodeFromIndex( node );
00543         if(nodeInstnace->GetParent()&&nodeInstnace->GetParent()->GetNode()->getTypeId().isDerivedFrom( SoBaseKit::getClassTypeId() ) )
00544         {
00545                 SoNode* coinNode = nodeInstnace->GetNode();
00546                 //if( coinNode->getTypeId().isDerivedFrom( TTracker::getClassTypeId() ) ) return;
00547 
00548                 QUndoCommand* dragAndDrop = new QUndoCommand();
00549                 dragAndDrop->setText("Drag and Drop node");
00550                 new CmdCut( node, m_coinNode_Buffer, m_sceneModel, dragAndDrop );
00551 
00552                 new CmdPaste( tgc::Copied, newParent, coinNode, *m_sceneModel, dragAndDrop );
00553                 m_commandStack->push( dragAndDrop );
00554 
00555                 m_sceneModel->UpdateSceneModel();
00556                 m_document->SetDocumentModified( true );
00557         }
00558 
00559 }
00560 
00564 void MainWindow::ItemDragAndDropCopy(const QModelIndex& newParent, const QModelIndex& node)
00565 {
00566         InstanceNode* nodeInstnace = m_sceneModel->NodeFromIndex( node );
00567         SoNode* coinNode = nodeInstnace->GetNode();
00568         //if( coinNode->getTypeId().isDerivedFrom( TTracker::getClassTypeId() ) ) return;
00569 
00570         QUndoCommand* dragAndDropCopy = new QUndoCommand();
00571         dragAndDropCopy->setText("Drag and Drop Copy");
00572         new CmdCopy( node, m_coinNode_Buffer, m_sceneModel );
00573         new CmdPaste( tgc::Shared, newParent, coinNode, *m_sceneModel, dragAndDropCopy );
00574         m_commandStack->push( dragAndDropCopy );
00575 
00576         m_sceneModel->UpdateSceneModel();
00577         m_document->SetDocumentModified( true );
00578 }

00583 void MainWindow::Open()
00584 {
00585     if ( OkToContinue() )
00586     {
00587         QSettings settings( "NREL UTB CENER", "Tonatiuh" );
00588         QString openDirectory = settings.value( "openDirectory", QString( "." ) ).toString();
00589 
00590         QString fileName = QFileDialog::getOpenFileName( this,
00591                                tr( "Open" ), openDirectory,
00592                                tr( "Tonatiuh files (*.tnh)" ) );
00593 
00594         if( fileName.isEmpty() ) return;
00595 
00596         QFileInfo file( fileName );
00597         settings.setValue( "openDirectory", file.absolutePath() );
00598         StartOver( fileName );
00599     }
00600 }
00601 
00605 void MainWindow::OpenRecentFile()
00606 {
00607     if ( OkToContinue() )
00608     {
00609         QAction* action = qobject_cast<QAction *>( sender() );
00610 
00611         if ( action )
00612         {
00613                 QString fileName = action->data().toString();
00614                 StartOver( fileName );
00615         }
00616     }
00617 }

00634 bool MainWindow::Save()
00635 {
00636         if ( m_currentFile.isEmpty() ) return SaveAs();
00637         else return SaveFile( m_currentFile );
00638 }

00645 bool MainWindow::SaveAs()
00646 {
00647 
00648         QSettings settings( "NREL UTB CENER", "Tonatiuh" );
00649 
00650         QString saveDirectory = settings.value( "saveDirectory", QString( "." ) ).toString();
00651 
00652         QString tonatiuhFilter( "Tonatiuh files (*.tnh)" );
00653         QString fileName = QFileDialog::getSaveFileName( this,
00654                                tr( "Save" ), saveDirectory,
00655                                tonatiuhFilter, &tonatiuhFilter );
00656         if( fileName.isEmpty() ) return false;
00657 
00658         QFileInfo file( fileName );
00659         settings.setValue( "saveDirectory", file.absolutePath() );
00660 
00661         if( file.completeSuffix().compare( "tnh" ) )
00662                 fileName.append( ".tnh" );
00663         return SaveFile( fileName );
00664 }
00665 
00670 bool MainWindow::SaveComponent()
00671 {
00672     if( !m_selectionModel->hasSelection() ) return false;
00673     if( m_selectionModel->currentIndex() == sceneModelView->rootIndex() ) return false;
00674 
00675     QModelIndex componentIndex = sceneModelView->currentIndex();
00676 
00677     SoNode* coinNode = m_sceneModel->NodeFromIndex( componentIndex )->GetNode();
00678 
00679     if ( !coinNode->getTypeId().isDerivedFrom( TSeparatorKit::getClassTypeId() ) )
00680     {
00681         QMessageBox::warning( 0, tr( "Tonatiuh" ),
00682                                   tr( "Selected node in not valid  for component node" ) );
00683         return false;
00684     }
00685 
00686     TSeparatorKit* componentRoot = dynamic_cast< TSeparatorKit* > ( coinNode );
00687     if( !componentRoot ) return false;
00688 
00689 
00690         QString fileName = QFileDialog::getSaveFileName( this,
00691                                tr( "Save Tonatiuh component" ), ".",
00692                                tr( "Tonatiuh component (*.tcmp)" ) );
00693         if( fileName.isEmpty() ) return false;
00694 
00695         QFileInfo componentFile( fileName );
00696         if( componentFile.completeSuffix().compare( "tcmp" ) )
00697                 fileName.append( ".tcmp" );
00698 
00699     SoWriteAction SceneOuput;
00700     if ( !SceneOuput.getOutput()->openFile( fileName.toLatin1().constData() ) )
00701         {
00702         QMessageBox::warning( 0, tr( "Tonatiuh" ),
00703                               tr( "Cannot open file %1. " )
00704                             .arg( fileName ));
00705                 return false;
00706         }
00707 
00708     QApplication::setOverrideCursor( Qt::WaitCursor );
00709         SceneOuput.getOutput()->setBinary( false );
00710         SceneOuput.apply( componentRoot );
00711         SceneOuput.getOutput()->closeFile();
00712         QApplication::restoreOverrideCursor();
00713         return true;
00714 }
00715 
00719 void MainWindow::SelectionFinish( SoSelection* selection )
00720 {
00721     if(selection->getNumSelected() == 0 ) return;
00722 
00723     SoPath* selectionPath = selection->getPath( 0 );
00724     if ( !selectionPath ) return;
00725 
00726     if ( !selectionPath->containsNode ( m_document->GetSceneKit() ) ) return;
00727 
00728     SoNodeKitPath* nodeKitPath = static_cast< SoNodeKitPath* >( selectionPath );
00729     if(nodeKitPath->getTail()->getTypeId().isDerivedFrom(TLightKit::getClassTypeId() ) )
00730     {
00731         selection->deselectAll();
00732         QModelIndex currentIndex = m_selectionModel->currentIndex();
00733         m_selectionModel->setCurrentIndex( currentIndex , QItemSelectionModel::ClearAndSelect );
00734         return;
00735     }
00736 
00737     if(nodeKitPath->getTail()->getTypeId().isDerivedFrom(SoDragger::getClassTypeId() ) ) return;
00738 
00739     QModelIndex nodeIndex = m_sceneModel->IndexFromPath( *nodeKitPath );
00740 
00741 
00742         if ( !nodeIndex.isValid() ) return;
00743         m_selectionModel->setCurrentIndex( nodeIndex , QItemSelectionModel::ClearAndSelect );
00744         m_selectionModel->select( nodeIndex , QItemSelectionModel::ClearAndSelect );
00745 
00746 }

00755 
00756         m_sceneModel->UpdateSceneModel();
00757         m_document->SetDocumentModified( true );
00758 }

00779 
00783 void MainWindow::ShowMenu( const QModelIndex& index)
00784 {
00785         if( !index.isValid() ) return;
00786         m_selectionModel->setCurrentIndex( index, QItemSelectionModel::ClearAndSelect );
00787 
00788         InstanceNode* instanceNode = m_sceneModel->NodeFromIndex(index);
00789         SoNode* coinNode = instanceNode->GetNode();
00790         SoType type = coinNode->getTypeId();
00791 
00792         QMenu popupmenu(this);
00793 
00794         if(instanceNode->GetParent()&&instanceNode->GetParent()->GetNode()->getTypeId().isDerivedFrom( SoBaseKit::getClassTypeId() ) )
00795         {
00796                 popupmenu.addAction( actionCut );
00797                 popupmenu.addAction( actionCopy );
00798                 popupmenu.addAction( actionPasteCopy );
00799                 popupmenu.addAction( actionPasteLink );
00800                 popupmenu.addAction( actionDelete );
00801         }
00802 
00803         if( type.isDerivedFrom( TSeparatorKit::getClassTypeId() ) && !(type.isDerivedFrom( TAnalyzerKit::getClassTypeId() )))
00804         {
00805                 QMenu * trackersMenu = popupmenu.addMenu("Trackers" );
00806                 trackersMenu->addAction( actionSetAimingPointRelative);
00807                 trackersMenu->addAction( actionSetAimingPointAbsolute);
00808 
00809                 QMenu * transformMenu = popupmenu.addMenu("Convert to" );
00810                 //QMenu transformMenu( "Convert to", &popupmenu );
00811                 //popupmenu.addAction( transformMenu.menuAction() );
00812                 TSeparatorKit* coinKit = dynamic_cast< TSeparatorKit* > ( coinNode );
00813                 SoTransform* transform = static_cast< SoTransform* >( coinKit->getPart("transform", true) );
00814                 SoType transformType = transform->getTypeId();
00815 
00816 
00817                 if (!transformType.isDerivedFrom(SoCenterballManip::getClassTypeId()) ) transformMenu->addAction( tr("SoCenterballManip"),  this, SLOT(SoTransform_to_SoCenterballManip()));
00818                 if (!transformType.isDerivedFrom(SoHandleBoxManip::getClassTypeId()) )  transformMenu->addAction( tr("SoHandleBoxManip"), this, SLOT(SoTransform_to_SoHandleBoxManip()));
00819                 if (!transformType.isDerivedFrom(SoJackManip::getClassTypeId()) )       transformMenu->addAction( tr("SoJackManip"), this, SLOT(SoTransform_to_SoJackManip()));
00820                 if (!transformType.isDerivedFrom(SoTabBoxManip::getClassTypeId()) )     transformMenu->addAction( tr("SoTabBoxManip"), this, SLOT(SoTransform_to_SoTabBoxManip()));
00821                 if (!transformType.isDerivedFrom(SoTrackballManip::getClassTypeId()) ) transformMenu->addAction( tr("SoTrackballManip"),  this, SLOT(SoTransform_to_SoTrackballManip()));
00822                 if (!transformType.isDerivedFrom(SoTransformBoxManip::getClassTypeId()) ) transformMenu->addAction( tr("SoTransformBoxManip"), this, SLOT(SoTransform_to_SoTransformBoxManip()));
00823                 if (!transformType.isDerivedFrom(SoTransformerManip::getClassTypeId()) ) transformMenu->addAction( tr("SoTransformerManip"), this, SLOT(SoTransform_to_SoTransformerManip()));
00824 
00825 
00826 
00827                 if ( transformType.isDerivedFrom(SoTransformManip::getClassTypeId()) )  transformMenu->addAction( tr("SoTransform"), this, SLOT(SoManip_to_SoTransform()) );
00828 
00829         }
00830 
00831         //Mostramos el menu contextual
00832         popupmenu.exec( QCursor::pos() );
00833 
00834 }

00839 void MainWindow::ShowRayTracerOptionsDialog()
00840 {
00841         QVector< RandomDeviateFactory* > randomDeviateFactoryList = m_pluginManager->GetRandomDeviateFactories();
00842         QVector< TPhotonMapFactory* > photonmapFactoryList = m_pluginManager->GetPhotonMapFactories();
00843 
00844         RayTraceDialog* options = new RayTraceDialog( m_raysPerIteration, randomDeviateFactoryList, m_fraction,m_widthDivisions,m_heightDivisions, m_drawPhotons, photonmapFactoryList, m_selectedRandomDeviate, m_selectedPhotonMap, m_increasePhotonMap, this );
00845         options->exec();
00846 
00847         SetRaysPerIteration( options->GetNumRays() );
00848         SetRandomDeviateType( randomDeviateFactoryList[options->GetRandomDeviateFactoryIndex()]->RandomDeviateName() );
00849         SetPhotonMapType( photonmapFactoryList[options->GetPhotonMapFactoryIndex()]->TPhotonMapName() );
00850 
00851         SetRaysDrawingOptions( options->GetRaysFactionToDraw(), options->DrawPhotons() );
00852         SetRayCastingGrid( options->GetWidthDivisions(), options->GetHeightDivisions() );
00853 
00854 
00855         SetIncreasePhtonMap( options->IncreasePhotonMap() );
00856 
00857 }

00885         {

00890         }
00891         else

00898 
00899 void MainWindow::on_actionSunPlane_triggered()
00900 {
00901 
00902         SoSceneKit* coinScene = m_document->GetSceneKit();
00903         if ( !coinScene )  return;
00904 
00905         //Check if there is a light and is properly configured
00906         if ( !coinScene->getPart( "lightList[0]", false ) )     return;
00907         TLightKit* lightKit = static_cast< TLightKit* >( coinScene->getPart( "lightList[0]", false ) );
00908         if ( !lightKit ) return;
00909 
00910 
00911         SoSearchAction* coinSearch = new SoSearchAction();
00912         coinSearch->setNode( lightKit );
00913         coinSearch->setInterest( SoSearchAction::FIRST );
00914         coinSearch->apply( m_graphicsRoot->GetNode() );
00915 
00916         SoPath* lightPath = coinSearch->getPath( );
00917         if( !lightPath ) tgf::SevereError( "MainWindow Null light path." );
00918 
00919         const SbViewportRegion vpr = m_graphicView[m_focusView]->GetViewportRegion();
00920         SoGetMatrixAction * getmatrixaction = new SoGetMatrixAction(vpr);
00921         getmatrixaction->apply( lightPath );
00922 
00923         Transform  lightToWorld = tgf::TransformFromMatrix( getmatrixaction->getMatrix() );
00924 
00925         //Vector3D camOrientation= lightToWorld( Vector3D( 0.0, -1.0, 0.0 ) );
00926 
00927         //double t = 1.0;
00928         //if( camPosition.y != 0.0 && camOrientation.y != 0.0 ) t = -camPosition.y / camOrientation.y;
00929         //Point3D targetPoint = camPosition + camOrientation * t;
00930 
00931 
00932         SoCamera* cam = m_graphicView[m_focusView]->GetCamera();
00933         Point3D camPosition = lightToWorld( Point3D( 0.0, cam->focalDistance.getValue(), 0.0 ) );
00934 
00935 
00936         SbVec3f target = getTargetOfCamera(cam);
00937 
00938         cam->position.setValue( target + SbVec3f( camPosition.x, camPosition.y, camPosition.z ) );
00939         cam->pointAt( target );
00940         //cam->viewAll( m_graphicsRoot->GetNode(), vpr );
00941 }
00942 
00943 SbVec3f MainWindow::getTargetOfCamera(SoCamera* cam)
00944 {
00945         SbVec3f axis;
00946         float angle;
00947         cam->orientation.getValue(axis,angle);
00948         SbRotation * rotation  = new SbRotation (axis,angle);
00949         SbVec3f center;
00950         rotation->multVec(SbVec3f (0, 0, -cam->focalDistance.getValue()), center);
00951         center += cam->position.getValue();
00952         return center;
00953 }
00954 
00955 void MainWindow::on_action_X_Y_Plane_triggered()
00956 {
00957         SoCamera* cam = m_graphicView[m_focusView]->GetCamera();
00958 
00959         SbVec3f target = getTargetOfCamera(cam);
00960 
00961         cam->position.setValue( target + SbVec3f( 0, 0, cam->focalDistance.getValue() ) );
00962         cam->pointAt( target, SbVec3f( 0, 1, 0 )  );
00963 
00964         //SbViewportRegion vpr = m_graphicView[m_focusView]->GetViewportRegion();
00965         //cam->viewAll( m_graphicsRoot->GetNode(), vpr );
00966 
00967 }
00968 
00969 void MainWindow::on_action_X_Z_Plane_triggered()
00970 {
00971         SoCamera* cam = m_graphicView[m_focusView]->GetCamera();
00972         SbVec3f target = getTargetOfCamera(cam);
00973 
00974         cam->position.setValue( target + SbVec3f( 0, cam->focalDistance.getValue(), 0 ) );
00975         cam->pointAt( target, SbVec3f( 0, 0, 1 )  );
00976 
00977         //SbViewportRegion vpr = m_graphicView[m_focusView]->GetViewportRegion();
00978         //cam->viewAll( m_graphicsRoot->GetNode(), vpr );
00979 }

00981 void MainWindow::on_action_Y_Z_Plane_triggered()
00982 {
00983         SoCamera* cam = m_graphicView[m_focusView]->GetCamera();
00984         SbVec3f target = getTargetOfCamera(cam);
00985 
00986         cam->position.setValue( target + SbVec3f( -cam->focalDistance.getValue(), 0, 0 ) );
00987         cam->pointAt( target, SbVec3f( 0, 1, 0 )  );
00988 }

01021 
01025 void MainWindow::ChangeGridSettings()
01026 {
01027         GridSettingsDialog gridDialog( m_gridXElements, m_gridZElements, m_gridXSpacing, m_gridZSpacing );
01028         if( gridDialog.exec() )
01029         {
01030                 m_graphicsRoot->RemoveGrid();
01031 
01032                 m_gridXElements = gridDialog.GetXDimension();
01033                 m_gridZElements = gridDialog.GetZDimension();
01034 
01035                 if( gridDialog.IsSizeDefined() )
01036                 {
01037                         m_gridXSpacing = gridDialog.GetXSpacing();
01038                         m_gridZSpacing = gridDialog.GetZSpacing();
01039                 }
01040                 else
01041                 {
01042 
01043                         InstanceNode* sceneInstance = m_sceneModel->NodeFromIndex( sceneModelView->rootIndex() );
01044                         if ( !sceneInstance )  return;
01045                         InstanceNode* rootInstance = sceneInstance->children[sceneInstance->children.size() -1 ];
01046                         if ( !rootInstance )  return;
01047 
01048                         SoGetBoundingBoxAction* bbAction = new SoGetBoundingBoxAction( SbViewportRegion() ) ;
01049                         rootInstance->GetNode()->getBoundingBox( bbAction );
01050 
01051                         SbBox3f box = bbAction->getXfBoundingBox().project();
01052                         delete bbAction;
01053 
01054 
01055                         m_gridXSpacing = 10;
01056                         m_gridZSpacing = 10;
01057 
01058                         if( !box.isEmpty() )
01059                         {
01060                                 SbVec3f min, max;
01061                                 box.getBounds(min, max);
01062 
01063                                 m_gridXSpacing = ( 2 *  std::max( fabs( max[0] ), fabs( min[0] ) ) + 5  ) / m_gridXElements;
01064                                 m_gridZSpacing = ( 2 *  std::max( fabs( max[2] ), fabs( min[2] ) ) + 5 ) / m_gridZElements;
01065 
01066                         }
01067 
01068                 }
01069                 m_graphicsRoot->AddGrid( CreateGrid( m_gridXElements, m_gridZElements, m_gridXSpacing, m_gridZSpacing ) );
01070                 m_graphicsRoot->ShowGrid( true );
01071         }
01072 
01073 }

01078 void MainWindow::ChangeNodeName( const QModelIndex& index, const QString& newName )
01079 {
01080         if( !index.isValid() )  return;
01081 
01082         InstanceNode* nodeInstance = m_sceneModel->NodeFromIndex( index );
01083         if( !nodeInstance ) return;
01084         if( ! nodeInstance->GetNode() ) return;
01085 
01086         CmdChangeNodeName* command = new CmdChangeNodeName( index, newName, m_sceneModel );
01087         QString commandText = QString( "Node name changed to: %1").arg( newName );
01088         command->setText(commandText);
01089         m_commandStack->push( command );
01090 
01091         m_document->SetDocumentModified( true );
01092 
01093 }

01099 void MainWindow::ChangeSunPosition( double azimuth, double elevation )
01100 {
01101 
01102         SoSceneKit* coinScene = m_document->GetSceneKit();
01103         TLightKit* lightKit = static_cast< TLightKit* >( coinScene->getPart( "lightList[0]", false ) );
01104         if ( !lightKit )
01105         {
01106                 QMessageBox::warning( this, "Tonatiuh warning", tr( "ChangeSunPosition:: Sun not defined in scene" ) );
01107                 return;
01108         }
01109         CmdLightPositionModified* command = new CmdLightPositionModified( lightKit, azimuth* tgc::Degree, ( 90 - elevation ) * tgc::Degree );
01110         m_commandStack->push( command );
01111 
01112         //UpdateLightDimensions();
01113         m_sceneModel->UpdateSceneModel();
01114         m_document->SetDocumentModified( true );
01115 
01116 }
01117 
01123 void MainWindow::ChangeSunPosition(int year, int month, int day, double hours, double minutes, double seconds, double latitude, double longitude )
01124 {
01125         if( ( month < 0 ) || ( month> 12 ) ||
01126                         ( day < 0 ) || ( day > 31  ) ||
01127                         ( hours < 0 ) || ( hours > 23  ) ||
01128                         ( minutes < 0 ) || ( minutes > 59  ) ||
01129                         ( seconds < 0 ) || ( seconds >= 60  ) ||
01130                         ( longitude < -180. ) || ( longitude > 180.  ) ||
01131                         ( latitude < -90. ) || ( latitude > 90.  ) )
01132         {
01133                 QMessageBox::warning( this, "Tonatiuh warning", tr( "ChangeSunPosition:: Not valid value define to new sun position." ) );
01134                 return;
01135         }
01136 
01137         cTime myTime = { year, month, day, hours, minutes, seconds };
01138         cLocation myLocation = { longitude , latitude };
01139         cSunCoordinates results;
01140         sunpos( myTime, myLocation, &results );
01141         ChangeSunPosition( results.dAzimuth, ( 90 - results.dZenithAngle ) );
01142 }
01143 
01148 void  MainWindow::Copy( )
01149 {
01150         if( !m_selectionModel->hasSelection() )
01151         {
01152                 emit Abort( tr( "Copy: No node seleted to copy." ) );
01153                 return;
01154         }
01155         if( m_selectionModel->currentIndex() == sceneModelView->rootIndex() )
01156         {
01157                 emit Abort( tr( "Copy: The root node can not bee copied." ) );
01158                 return;
01159         }
01160         if( m_selectionModel->currentIndex().parent() == sceneModelView->rootIndex() )
01161         {
01162                 emit Abort( tr( "Copy: The root node can not bee copied." ) );
01163                 return;
01164         }
01165 
01166         CmdCopy* command = new CmdCopy( m_selectionModel->currentIndex(), m_coinNode_Buffer, m_sceneModel );
01167         m_commandStack->push( command );
01168 
01169         m_document->SetDocumentModified( true );
01170 }
01171 
01177 void MainWindow::Copy( QString nodeURL )
01178 {
01179         QModelIndex nodeIndex = m_sceneModel->IndexFromNodeUrl( nodeURL );
01180 
01181         if( !nodeIndex.isValid() )
01182         {
01183                 emit Abort( tr( "Copy: There is no node with defined url." ) );
01184                 return;
01185         }
01186         if( nodeIndex == sceneModelView->rootIndex() || nodeIndex.parent() == sceneModelView->rootIndex() )
01187         {
01188                 emit Abort( tr( "Copy: The root node can not bee copied." ) );
01189                 return;
01190         }
01191 
01192         CmdCopy* command = new CmdCopy( nodeIndex, m_coinNode_Buffer, m_sceneModel );
01193         m_commandStack->push( command );
01194 
01195         m_document->SetDocumentModified( true );
01196         return;
01197 
01198 }
01199 
01203 void MainWindow::CreateGroupNode()
01204 {
01205         QModelIndex parentIndex;
01206         if (( !sceneModelView->currentIndex().isValid() ) || ( sceneModelView->currentIndex() == sceneModelView->rootIndex()))
01207                 parentIndex = m_sceneModel->index (0,0,sceneModelView->rootIndex());
01208         else
01209                 parentIndex = sceneModelView->currentIndex();
01210 
01211         InstanceNode* parentInstance = m_sceneModel->NodeFromIndex( parentIndex );
01212         if( !parentInstance )
01213         {
01214                 emit Abort( tr( "CreateGroupNode: Error creating new group node." ) );
01215                 return;
01216         }
01217 
01218         SoNode* coinNode = parentInstance->GetNode();
01219         if( !coinNode )
01220         {
01221                 emit Abort( tr( "CreateGroupNode: Error creating new group node." ) );
01222                 return;
01223         }
01224 
01225         if ( coinNode->getTypeId().isDerivedFrom( TAnalyzerKit::getClassTypeId() ) )
01226         {
01227                 emit Abort( tr( "CreateGroupNode: Error creating new group node." ) );
01228                 return;
01229         }
01230 
01231         if ( coinNode->getTypeId().isDerivedFrom( TSeparatorKit::getClassTypeId() ) )
01232         {
01233                 TSeparatorKit* separatorKit = new TSeparatorKit();
01234 
01235                 CmdInsertSeparatorKit* cmdInsertSeparatorKit = new CmdInsertSeparatorKit( separatorKit, QPersistentModelIndex(parentIndex), m_sceneModel );
01236                 cmdInsertSeparatorKit->setText( "Insert SeparatorKit node" );
01237                 m_commandStack->push( cmdInsertSeparatorKit );
01238 
01239                 int count = 1;
01240                 QString nodeName = QString( "TSeparatorKit%1").arg( QString::number( count) );
01241                 while ( !m_sceneModel->SetNodeName( separatorKit, nodeName ) )
01242                 {
01243                         count++;
01244                         nodeName = QString( "TSeparatorKit%1").arg( QString::number( count) );
01245                 }
01246                 
01247                 m_sceneModel->UpdateSceneModel();
01248                 m_document->SetDocumentModified( true );
01249 
01250 
01251         }
01252         //emit Abort( tr( "CreateGroupNode: Error creating new group node." ) );
01253 
01254 }
01255 
01259 void MainWindow::CreateAnalyzerNode()
01260 {
01261         QModelIndex parentIndex;
01262         if (( ! sceneModelView->currentIndex().isValid() ) || (sceneModelView->currentIndex() == sceneModelView->rootIndex()))
01263                 parentIndex = m_sceneModel->index (0,0, sceneModelView->rootIndex());
01264         else
01265                 parentIndex = sceneModelView->currentIndex();
01266 
01267         InstanceNode* parentInstance = m_sceneModel->NodeFromIndex( parentIndex );
01268         if( !parentInstance )
01269         {
01270                 emit Abort( tr( "CreateAnalyzerNode: No parent node for analyzer node." ) );
01271                 return;
01272         }
01273 
01274 
01275         SoNode* selectedCoinNode = parentInstance->GetNode();
01276         if( !selectedCoinNode )
01277         {
01278                 emit Abort( tr( "CreateAnalyzerNode: There is no node selected for analyzer node." ) );
01279                 return;
01280         }
01281 
01282         if ( selectedCoinNode->getTypeId().isDerivedFrom( TSeparatorKit::getClassTypeId() ) )
01283         {
01284                 TAnalyzerKit* analyzerKit = new TAnalyzerKit;
01285 
01286                 CmdInsertAnalyzerKit* insertAnalyzerKit = new CmdInsertAnalyzerKit( parentIndex, analyzerKit, m_sceneModel );
01287                 m_commandStack->push( insertAnalyzerKit );
01288 
01289                 int count = 1;
01290                 QString nodeName = QString( "TAnalyzerKit%1").arg( QString::number( count) );
01291                 while ( !m_sceneModel->SetNodeName( analyzerKit, nodeName ) )
01292                 {
01293                         count++;
01294                         nodeName = QString( "TAnalyzerKit%1").arg( QString::number( count) );
01295                 }
01296                 m_sceneModel->UpdateSceneModel();
01297                 m_document->SetDocumentModified( true );
01298         }
01299 }
01305 void MainWindow::CreateMaterial( QString materialType )
01306 {
01307         QVector< TMaterialFactory* > factoryList = m_pluginManager->GetMaterialFactories();
01308         if( factoryList.size() == 0 )   return;
01309 
01310         QVector< QString > materialNames;
01311         for( int i = 0; i < factoryList.size(); i++ )
01312                 materialNames<< factoryList[i]->TMaterialName();
01313 
01314         int selectedMaterial = materialNames.indexOf( materialType );
01315         if( selectedMaterial < 0 )
01316         {
01317                 emit Abort( tr( "CreateMaterial: Selected material type is not valid." ) );
01318                 return;
01319         }
01320 
01321         CreateMaterial( factoryList[ selectedMaterial ] );
01322 }
01323

01338

01343                 return ;
01344         }
01345

01347 }
01348 
01352 void MainWindow::CreateSurfaceNode()
01353 {
01354         QModelIndex parentIndex;
01355         if (( ! sceneModelView->currentIndex().isValid() ) || (sceneModelView->currentIndex() == sceneModelView->rootIndex()))
01356                 parentIndex = m_sceneModel->index (0,0, sceneModelView->rootIndex());
01357         else
01358                 parentIndex = sceneModelView->currentIndex();
01359 
01360         InstanceNode* parentInstance = m_sceneModel->NodeFromIndex( parentIndex );
01361         if( !parentInstance ) return;
01362 
01363         SoNode* selectedCoinNode = parentInstance->GetNode();
01364         if( !selectedCoinNode ) return;
01365 
01366         if ( selectedCoinNode->getTypeId().isDerivedFrom( TSeparatorKit::getClassTypeId() ) )
01367         {
01368                 TShapeKit* shapeKit = new TShapeKit;
01369 
01370                 CmdInsertShapeKit* insertShapeKit = new CmdInsertShapeKit( parentIndex, shapeKit, m_sceneModel );
01371                 m_commandStack->push( insertShapeKit );
01372 
01373                 int count = 1;
01374                 QString nodeName = QString( "TShapeKit%1").arg( QString::number( count) );
01375                 while ( !m_sceneModel->SetNodeName( shapeKit, nodeName ) )
01376                 {
01377                         count++;
01378                         nodeName = QString( "TShapeKit%1").arg( QString::number( count) );
01379                 }
01380                 m_sceneModel->UpdateSceneModel();
01381                 m_document->SetDocumentModified( true );
01382 
01383         }
01384 
01385         //emit Abort( tr( "CreateSurfaceNode: Selected node is not valid as surface node parent." ) );
01386 
01387 }
01388

01418 void MainWindow::Cut()
01419 {
01420         int validNode = 1;
01421         if( !m_selectionModel->hasSelection() ) validNode = 0;
01422         if( m_selectionModel->currentIndex() == sceneModelView->rootIndex() ) validNode = 0;
01423         if( m_selectionModel->currentIndex().parent() == sceneModelView->rootIndex() ) validNode = 0;
01424         if( !validNode )
01425         {
01426                 emit Abort( tr( "Cut: No valid node selected to cut." ) );
01427                 return;
01428         }
01429         CmdCut* command = new CmdCut( m_selectionModel->currentIndex(), m_coinNode_Buffer, m_sceneModel );
01430         m_commandStack->push( command );
01431 
01432         m_sceneModel->UpdateSceneModel();
01433         m_document->SetDocumentModified( true );
01434 }
01435 
01439 void MainWindow::Cut( QString nodeURL )
01440 {
01441         if( nodeURL.isEmpty() )
01442         {
01443                 emit Abort(  tr( "Cut: There is no node with defined url." ) );
01444                 return;
01445         }
01446 
01447         QModelIndex nodeIndex = m_sceneModel->IndexFromNodeUrl( nodeURL );
01448 
01449         if( !nodeIndex.isValid() )
01450         {
01451                 emit Abort( tr( "Cut: There is no node with defined url." ) );
01452                 return;
01453         }
01454 
01455         if( nodeIndex == sceneModelView->rootIndex() )
01456         {
01457                 emit Abort( tr( "Cut: Selected node is not valid node to cut." ) );
01458                 return;
01459         }
01460         if( nodeIndex.parent() == sceneModelView->rootIndex() )
01461         {
01462                 emit Abort( tr( "Cut: Selected node is not valid node to cut." ) );
01463                 return;
01464         }
01465 
01466         CmdCut* command = new CmdCut( nodeIndex, m_coinNode_Buffer, m_sceneModel );
01467         m_commandStack->push( command );
01468 
01469         m_sceneModel->UpdateSceneModel();
01470         m_document->SetDocumentModified( true );
01471 }
01472 
01476 void MainWindow::Delete( )
01477 {
01478         if( !m_selectionModel->hasSelection() )
01479         {
01480                 emit Abort(  tr( "Delete: There is no node selected to delete." ) );
01481                 return;
01482         }
01483 
01484         QModelIndex selection = m_selectionModel->currentIndex();
01485         m_selectionModel->clearSelection();
01486 
01487         InstanceNode* selectionNode = m_sceneModel->NodeFromIndex( selection );
01488         m_selectionModel->setCurrentIndex( m_sceneModel->IndexFromNodeUrl( selectionNode->GetParent()->GetNodeURL() ), QItemSelectionModel::ClearAndSelect );
01489 
01490         Delete( selection );
01491 }
01492 
01498 void MainWindow::Delete( QString nodeURL )
01499 {
01500         QModelIndex nodeIndex = m_sceneModel->IndexFromNodeUrl( nodeURL );
01501         if( !nodeIndex.isValid() )
01502         {
01503                 emit Abort(  tr( "Delete: There is no node with defined url." ) );
01504                 return;
01505         }
01506 
01507         Delete( nodeIndex );
01508         if( m_selectionModel->isSelected ( nodeIndex ) ) m_selectionModel->clearSelection();
01509 }
01510 
01514 int MainWindow::ExportAllPhotonMap( QString fileName )
01515 {
01516         if ( m_photonMap == NULL )      return 0 ;
01517 
01518         //Compute photon power
01519         TSceneKit* coinScene = m_document->GetSceneKit();
01520         if( !coinScene ) return 0;
01521         if( !coinScene->getPart( "lightList[0]", false ) ) return 0;
01522         TLightKit*lightKit = static_cast< TLightKit* >( coinScene->getPart( "lightList[0]", false ) );
01523 
01524 
01525         if( !lightKit->getPart( "tsunshape", false ) ) return 0;
01526         TSunShape* sunShape = static_cast< TSunShape * >( lightKit->getPart( "tsunshape", false ) );
01527         double irradiance = sunShape->GetIrradiance();
01528 
01529         if( !lightKit->getPart( "icon", false ) ) return 0;
01530         TLightShape* raycastingShape = static_cast< TLightShape * >( lightKit->getPart( "icon", false ) );
01531         double inputAperture = raycastingShape->GetValidArea();
01532 
01533         double wPhoton = ( inputAperture * irradiance ) / m_tracedRays;
01534 
01535         m_lastExportFileName = fileName;
01536         int okExport = trf::ExportAll( m_lastExportFileName, wPhoton, m_photonMap );
01537 
01538         return okExport;
01539 
01540 }
01541 
01546 int MainWindow::ExportPhotonMap( QString fileName, QString nodeUrl, bool globalCoord )
01547 {
01548         if( fileName.isEmpty() )        return 0;
01549         if( nodeUrl.isEmpty() ) return 0;
01550         if ( m_photonMap == NULL )      return 0;
01551 
01552         //Compute photon power
01553         TSceneKit* coinScene = m_document->GetSceneKit();
01554         if( !coinScene ) return 0;
01555         if( !coinScene->getPart( "lightList[0]", false ) ) return 0;
01556         TLightKit*lightKit = static_cast< TLightKit* >( coinScene->getPart( "lightList[0]", false ) );
01557 
01558 
01559         if( !lightKit->getPart( "tsunshape", false ) ) return 0;
01560         TSunShape* sunShape = static_cast< TSunShape * >( lightKit->getPart( "tsunshape", false ) );
01561         double irradiance = sunShape->GetIrradiance();
01562 
01563         if( !lightKit->getPart( "icon", false ) ) return 0;
01564         TLightShape* raycastingShape = static_cast< TLightShape * >( lightKit->getPart( "icon", false ) );
01565         double inputAperture = raycastingShape->GetValidArea();
01566 
01567         double wPhoton = ( inputAperture * irradiance ) / m_tracedRays;
01568 
01569         m_lastExportFileName = fileName;
01570         m_lastExportSurfaceUrl = nodeUrl;
01571         m_lastExportInGlobal = globalCoord;
01572 
01573         QModelIndex selectedNodeIndex = m_sceneModel->IndexFromNodeUrl( nodeUrl );
01574         //std::cout<<"Node to export: "<<nodeUrl.toStdString()<<std::endl;
01575         InstanceNode* selectedSurface = m_sceneModel->NodeFromIndex( selectedNodeIndex );
01576         //std::cout<<"fileName: "<<fileName.toStdString()<<std::endl;
01577         if( !selectedSurface )  return 0;
01578 
01579         int okExport = 0;
01580 
01581         //std::cout<<"Node to export: "<<nodeUrl.toStdString()<<std::endl;
01582         if( m_lastExportInGlobal )
01583                 okExport = trf::ExportSurfaceGlobalCoordinates( m_lastExportFileName, selectedSurface, wPhoton, m_photonMap );
01584         else
01585                 okExport = trf::ExportSurfaceLocalCoordinates( m_lastExportFileName, selectedSurface, wPhoton, m_photonMap );
01586 
01587         return okExport;
01588 
01589 }

01593         SetAimingPointRelativity( m_selectionModel->currentIndex(),relative );

01605

01608

01610

01619 void MainWindow::InsertFileComponent( QString componentFileName )
01620 {
01621         QModelIndex parentIndex;
01622         if (( !sceneModelView->currentIndex().isValid() ) || ( sceneModelView->currentIndex() == sceneModelView->rootIndex() ) )
01623                         parentIndex = m_sceneModel->index (0,0,sceneModelView->rootIndex());
01624         else
01625                 parentIndex = sceneModelView->currentIndex();
01626 
01627         SoNode* coinNode = m_sceneModel->NodeFromIndex( parentIndex )->GetNode();
01628         if ( !coinNode->getTypeId().isDerivedFrom( TSeparatorKit::getClassTypeId() ) )
01629         {
01630                 emit Abort( tr( "InsertFileComponent: Parent node is not valid node type." ) );
01631                 return;
01632         }
01633 
01634         if ( componentFileName.isEmpty() )
01635         {
01636                 emit Abort( tr( "InsertFileComponent: Cannot open file:\n%1." ).arg( componentFileName ) );
01637                 return;
01638         }
01639 
01640         SoInput componentInput;
01641         if ( !componentInput.openFile( componentFileName.toLatin1().constData() ) )
01642         {
01643                 emit Abort( tr( "Cannot open file:\n%1." ).arg( componentFileName ) );
01644                 return;
01645         }
01646 
01647         SoSeparator* componentSeparator = SoDB::readAll( &componentInput );
01648         componentInput.closeFile();
01649 
01650         if ( !componentSeparator )
01651         {
01652                 emit Abort( tr( "Error reading file: \n%1." ) .arg( componentFileName ) );
01653                 return;
01654         }
01655 
01656         TSeparatorKit* componentRoot = static_cast< TSeparatorKit* >( componentSeparator->getChild(0) );
01657         CmdInsertSeparatorKit* cmdInsertSeparatorKit = new CmdInsertSeparatorKit( componentRoot, QPersistentModelIndex(parentIndex), m_sceneModel );
01658         cmdInsertSeparatorKit->setText( "Insert SeparatorKit node" );
01659         m_commandStack->push( cmdInsertSeparatorKit );
01660 
01661         m_sceneModel->UpdateSceneModel();
01662         m_document->SetDocumentModified( true );
01663 
01664 }
01665 
01670 void MainWindow::New()
01671 {
01672     if ( !OkToContinue() )
01673     {
01674         emit Abort( tr( "Current Tonatiuh model cannot be closed." ) );
01675         return;
01676     }
01677 
01678     StartOver( "" );
01679 }

01684 void MainWindow::Open( QString fileName )
01685 {
01686         if( fileName.isEmpty() )
01687         {
01688                 QMessageBox::warning( this, QLatin1String( "Tonatiuh" ),
01689                                 tr( "Open: Cannot open file:\n%1." ).arg( fileName ) );
01690                 emit Abort( tr( "Open: Cannot open file:\n%1." ).arg( fileName ) );
01691                 return;
01692         }
01693 
01694         QFileInfo file( fileName );
01695         if( !file.exists() )
01696         {
01697                 QMessageBox::warning( this, QLatin1String( "Tonatiuh" ),
01698                                 tr( "Open: Cannot open file:\n%1." ).arg( fileName ) );
01699                 emit Abort( tr( "Open: Cannot open file:\n%1." ).arg( fileName ) );
01700                 return;
01701         }
01702 
01703         StartOver( fileName );
01704 }

01710 void MainWindow::Paste( QString nodeURL, QString pasteType )
01711 {
01712 
01713         if( !m_coinNode_Buffer )
01714         {
01715                 emit Abort( tr( "Paste: There is not node copied." ) );
01716                 return;
01717         }
01718 
01719         QModelIndex nodeIndex = m_sceneModel->IndexFromNodeUrl( nodeURL );
01720         if( !nodeIndex.isValid() )
01721         {
01722                 emit Abort( tr( "Paste: The node url is not valid." ) );
01723                 return;
01724         }
01725 
01726         if( pasteType == QString( "Shared" ) )
01727                 Paste( nodeIndex, tgc::Shared );
01728         else
01729                 Paste( nodeIndex, tgc::Copied );
01730 }

01758 
01762 void MainWindow::Run()
01763 {
01764         QDateTime startTime = QDateTime::currentDateTime();
01765 
01766     // Initialize variables
01767         InstanceNode* rootSeparatorInstance = 0;
01768         InstanceNode* lightInstance = 0;
01769         SoTransform* lightTransform = 0;
01770         TSunShape* sunShape = 0;
01771         TLightShape* raycastingSurface = 0;
01772         TTransmissivity* transmissivity = 0;
01773 
01774         if( ReadyForRaytracing( rootSeparatorInstance, lightInstance, lightTransform, sunShape, raycastingSurface, transmissivity ) )
01775         {
01776                 m_sceneModel->UpdateSceneModel();
01777                 m_sceneModel->PrepareAnalyze();
01778                 QVector< QPair< TShapeKit*, Transform > > surfacesList;
01779 
01780                 //Compute bounding boxes and world to object transforms
01781                 trf::ComputeSceneTreeMap( rootSeparatorInstance, Transform( new Matrix4x4 ), &surfacesList,true );
01782                 if( surfacesList.count() < 1 )
01783                 {
01784                         emit Abort( tr( "There are no surfaces defined for ray tracing" ) );
01785                         return;
01786                 }
01787 
01788                 TLightKit* light = static_cast< TLightKit* > ( lightInstance->GetNode() );
01789                 light->ComputeLightSourceArea( m_widthDivisions,m_heightDivisions,surfacesList );
01790 
01791                 QVector< double > raysPerThread;
01792                 const int maximumValueProgressScale = 100;
01793                 unsigned long  t1 = m_raysPerIteration / maximumValueProgressScale;
01794 
01795                 for( int progressCount = 0; progressCount < maximumValueProgressScale; ++ progressCount )
01796                         raysPerThread<< t1;
01797 
01798                 if( ( t1 * maximumValueProgressScale ) < m_raysPerIteration )   raysPerThread<< ( m_raysPerIteration-( t1* maximumValueProgressScale) );
01799 
01800 
01801                 Transform lightToWorld = tgf::TransformFromSoTransform( lightTransform );
01802                 // Create a progress dialog.
01803                 QProgressDialog dialog;
01804                 dialog.setLabelText( QString("Progressing using %1 thread(s)..." ).arg( QThread::idealThreadCount() ) );
01805 
01806                 // Create a QFutureWatcher and conncect signals and slots.
01807                 QFutureWatcher< TPhotonMap* > futureWatcher;
01808                 QObject::connect(&futureWatcher, SIGNAL(finished()), &dialog, SLOT(reset()));
01809                 QObject::connect(&dialog, SIGNAL(canceled()), &futureWatcher, SLOT(cancel()));
01810                 QObject::connect(&futureWatcher, SIGNAL(progressRangeChanged(int, int)), &dialog, SLOT(setRange(int, int)));
01811                 QObject::connect(&futureWatcher, SIGNAL(progressValueChanged(int)), &dialog, SLOT(setValue(int)));
01812 
01813                 QMutex mutex;
01814                 QFuture< TPhotonMap* > photonMap;
01815                 if( transmissivity )
01816                         //photonMap = QtConcurrent::mappedReduced( raysPerPixel, RayTracer(  rootSeparatorInstance, lightInstance, raycastingSurface, sunShape, lightToWorld, transmissivity, *m_rand, &mutex, m_photonMap ), trf::CreatePhotonMap, QtConcurrent::UnorderedReduce );
01817                         photonMap = QtConcurrent::mappedReduced( raysPerThread, RayTracer(  rootSeparatorInstance, lightInstance, raycastingSurface, sunShape, lightToWorld, transmissivity, *m_rand, &mutex, m_photonMap ), trf::CreatePhotonMap, QtConcurrent::UnorderedReduce );
01818 
01819                 else
01820                         photonMap = QtConcurrent::mappedReduced( raysPerThread, RayTracerNoTr(  rootSeparatorInstance, lightInstance, raycastingSurface, sunShape, lightToWorld, *m_rand, &mutex, m_photonMap ), trf::CreatePhotonMap, QtConcurrent::UnorderedReduce );
01821                         //photonMap = QtConcurrent::mappedReduced( raysPerPixel, RayTracerNoTr(  rootSeparatorInstance, lightInstance, raycastingSurface, sunShape, lightToWorld, *m_rand, &mutex, m_photonMap ), trf::CreatePhotonMap, QtConcurrent::UnorderedReduce );
01822 
01823                 futureWatcher.setFuture( photonMap );
01824 
01825                 // Display the dialog and start the event loop.
01826                 dialog.exec();
01827                 futureWatcher.waitForFinished();
01828                 //m_tracedRays += t1 * validAreasList.count();
01829                 //m_raysPerIteration=m_tracedRays;
01830                 m_tracedRays += m_raysPerIteration;
01831 
01832 
01833 
01834 
01835                 QDateTime time2 = QDateTime::currentDateTime();
01836                 std::cout <<"time2: "<< startTime.secsTo( time2 ) << std::endl;
01837 
01838                 ShowRaysIn3DView();
01839 
01840 
01841         }
01842 
01843         QDateTime endTime = QDateTime::currentDateTime();
01844         std::cout <<"Elapsed time: "<< startTime.secsTo( endTime ) << std::endl;
01845 }
01846 
01850 void MainWindow::SaveAs( QString fileName )
01851 {
01852         if( fileName.isEmpty() )
01853         {
01854                 emit Abort( tr( "SaveAs: There is no file defined.") );
01855                 return;
01856         }
01857         QFileInfo fileInfo;
01858         if( fileInfo.completeSuffix() != QLatin1String( "tnh" ) )
01859         {
01860                 emit Abort( tr( "SaveAs: The file defined is not a tonatiuh file. The suffix must be tnh.") );
01861                 return;
01862         }
01863         SaveFile( fileName );
01864 
01865 }

01930 void MainWindow::SetPhotonMapType( QString typeName )
01931 {
01932         QVector< TPhotonMapFactory* > factoryList = m_pluginManager->GetPhotonMapFactories();
01933         if( factoryList.size() == 0 )   return;
01934 
01935         QVector< QString > photonMapNames;
01936         for( int i = 0; i < factoryList.size(); i++ )
01937                 photonMapNames<< factoryList[i]->TPhotonMapName();
01938 
01939         if( photonMapNames.indexOf( typeName ) < 0 )
01940         {
01941                 emit Abort( tr( "SetPhotonMapType: Defined photon map type is not valid type.") );
01942                 return;
01943         }
01944         m_selectedPhotonMap = photonMapNames.indexOf( typeName );
01945 
01946 }

01951 void MainWindow::SetRandomDeviateType( QString typeName )
01952 {
01953         QVector< RandomDeviateFactory* > factoryList = m_pluginManager->GetRandomDeviateFactories();
01954         if( factoryList.size() == 0 )   return;
01955 
01956         QVector< QString > randomNames;
01957         for( int i = 0; i < factoryList.size(); i++ )
01958                 randomNames<< factoryList[i]->RandomDeviateName();
01959 
01960         int oldSelectedRandomDeviate = m_selectedRandomDeviate;
01961 
01962         if( randomNames.indexOf( typeName ) < 0 )
01963         {
01964                 emit Abort( tr( "SetRandomDeviateType: Defined random generator is not valid type.") );
01965                 return;
01966         }
01967         m_selectedRandomDeviate = randomNames.indexOf( typeName );
01968         if( oldSelectedRandomDeviate != m_selectedRandomDeviate )
01969         {
01970                 delete m_rand;
01971                 m_rand = 0;
01972         }
01973 
01974 }

02003 
02007 void MainWindow::SetSunshape( QString sunshapeType )
02008 {
02009         SoSceneKit* coinScene = m_document->GetSceneKit();
02010         TLightKit* lightKit = 0;
02011         if ( coinScene->getPart( "lightList[0]", false ) )
02012         {
02013                 lightKit = static_cast< TLightKit* >( coinScene->getPart( "lightList[0]", false ) );
02014         }
02015         else
02016                 lightKit = new TLightKit;
02017 
02018 
02019         QVector< TSunShapeFactory* > factoryList = m_pluginManager->GetSunShapeFactories();
02020         if( factoryList.size() == 0 )   return;
02021 
02022         QVector< QString > factoryNames;
02023         for( int i = 0; i < factoryList.size(); i++ )
02024         {
02025                 QString name = factoryList[i]->TSunShapeName();
02026                 factoryNames<<name;
02027         }
02028 
02029         int selectedSunShapeIndex = factoryNames.indexOf( sunshapeType );
02030         if( selectedSunShapeIndex < 0 )
02031         {
02032                 emit Abort( tr( "SetSunshape: Defined sunshape is not valid type.") );
02033                 return;
02034         }
02035 
02036         lightKit->setPart( "tsunshape", factoryList[selectedSunShapeIndex]->CreateTSunShape() );
02037 
02038         CmdLightKitModified* command = new CmdLightKitModified( lightKit, coinScene, *m_sceneModel );
02039         m_commandStack->push( command );
02040 
02041         //UpdateLightDimensions();
02042         m_sceneModel->UpdateSceneModel();
02043 
02044         parametersView->UpdateView();
02045         m_document->SetDocumentModified( true );
02046 
02047         actionCalculateSunPosition->setEnabled( true );
02048 }
02049 
02053 void MainWindow::SetSunshapeParameter( QString parameter, QString value )
02054 {
02055         SoSceneKit* coinScene = m_document->GetSceneKit();
02056         TLightKit* lightKit = static_cast< TLightKit* >( coinScene->getPart( "lightList[0]", false ) );
02057         if( !lightKit )
02058         {
02059                 emit Abort( tr( "SetSunshapeParameter: There is not light defined.") );
02060                 return;
02061         }
02062 
02063         TSunShape* sunshape = static_cast< TSunShape* > ( lightKit->getPart( "tsunshape", false ) );
02064         if( !sunshape )
02065         {
02066                 emit Abort( tr( "SetSunshapeParameter: There is not sunshape defined.") );
02067                 return;
02068         }
02069 
02070         CmdModifyParameter* command = new CmdModifyParameter( sunshape, parameter, value, m_sceneModel );
02071         if ( m_commandStack ) m_commandStack->push( command );
02072     m_document->SetDocumentModified( true );
02073 }
02074 
02078 void MainWindow::SetTransmissivity( QString transmissivityType  )
02079 {
02080         TSceneKit* coinScene = m_document->GetSceneKit();
02081         if( !coinScene )
02082         {
02083                 emit Abort( tr( "SetTransmissivity: Error defining transmissivity.") );
02084                 return;
02085         }
02086         QVector< TTransmissivityFactory* > transmissivityFactoryList = m_pluginManager->GetTransmissivityFactories();
02087         if( transmissivityFactoryList.count() < 1 )
02088         {
02089                 emit Abort( tr( "SetTransmissivity: Error defining transmissivity.") );
02090                 return;
02091         }
02092 
02093         QStringList factoryNames;
02094         for( int i = 0; i < transmissivityFactoryList.count(); i++ )
02095         {
02096                 QString name = transmissivityFactoryList[i]->TTransmissivityName();
02097                 factoryNames<<name;
02098         }
02099 
02100 
02101         int transmissivityIndex = factoryNames.indexOf( transmissivityType );
02102         if( transmissivityIndex < 0 )
02103         {
02104                 emit Abort( tr( "SetTransmissivity: Defined transmissivity is not valid type.") );
02105                 return;
02106         }
02107 
02108         TTransmissivity* transmissivity = transmissivityFactoryList[ transmissivityIndex ]->CreateTTransmissivity();
02109         if( !transmissivity )
02110         {
02111                 emit Abort( tr( "SetTransmissivity: Error defining transmissivity.") );
02112                 return;
02113         }
02114 
02115         CmdTransmissivityModified* command = new CmdTransmissivityModified( transmissivity, coinScene );
02116         if ( m_commandStack ) m_commandStack->push( command );
02117     m_document->SetDocumentModified( true );
02118 }
02119 
02123 void MainWindow::SetTransmissivityParameter( QString parameter, QString value )
02124 {
02125         SoSceneKit* coinScene = m_document->GetSceneKit();
02126         TTransmissivity* transmissivity = static_cast< TTransmissivity* >( coinScene->getPart( "transmissivity", false ) );
02127         if( !transmissivity )
02128         {
02129                 emit Abort( tr( "SetTransmissivity: No transmissivity type defined.") );
02130                 return;
02131         }
02132 
02133         CmdModifyParameter* command = new CmdModifyParameter( transmissivity, parameter, value, m_sceneModel );
02134         if ( m_commandStack ) m_commandStack->push( command );
02135     m_document->SetDocumentModified( true );
02136 }
02137 
02141 void MainWindow::SetValue( QString nodeUrl, QString parameter, QString value )
02142 {
02143         if( nodeUrl.isEmpty() || parameter.isEmpty() || value.isEmpty() )
02144         {
02145                 emit Abort( tr( "SetValue: You must define a node url, a parameter name and a value." ) );
02146                 return;
02147         }
02148 
02149         QModelIndex nodeIndex = m_sceneModel->IndexFromNodeUrl( nodeUrl );
02150         if( !nodeIndex.isValid() )
02151         {
02152                 emit Abort( tr( "SetValue: Defined node url is not a valid url." ) );
02153                 return;
02154         }
02155 
02156         InstanceNode* nodeInstance = m_sceneModel->NodeFromIndex( nodeIndex );
02157         if( !nodeInstance )
02158         {
02159                 emit Abort( tr( "SetValue: Defined node url is not a valid url." ) );
02160                 return;
02161         }
02162 
02163         SoNode* node = nodeInstance->GetNode();
02164         if( !node )     return;
02165         if ( node->getTypeId().isDerivedFrom( TSeparatorKit::getClassTypeId() ) )
02166         {
02167                 TSeparatorKit* separatorNode = static_cast< TSeparatorKit* >( node );
02168                 SoTransform* nodeTransform = static_cast< SoTransform* >( separatorNode->getPart( "transform", true ) );
02169                 node = nodeTransform;
02170         }
02171 
02172 
02173         SoField* parameterField = node->getField( parameter.toStdString().c_str() );
02174         if( !parameterField )
02175         {
02176                 QMessageBox::information( this, "Tonatiuh",
02177             QString( "Defined node has not contains the parameter %1." ).arg( parameter), 1 );
02178                 return;
02179         }
02180         SetParameterValue( node, parameter, value );
02181 }
02182 
02183 
02184 //Manipulators actions
02185 void MainWindow::SoTransform_to_SoCenterballManip()
02186 {
02187         //Transform to a SoCenterballManip manipulator
02188         QModelIndex currentIndex = sceneModelView->currentIndex();
02189 
02190         InstanceNode* instanceNode = m_sceneModel->NodeFromIndex(currentIndex);
02191         SoBaseKit* coinNode = static_cast< SoBaseKit* >( instanceNode->GetNode() );
02192         SoTransform* transform = static_cast< SoTransform* >( coinNode->getPart( "transform", false ) );
02193 
02194         SoCenterballManip * manipulator = new SoCenterballManip;
02195         manipulator->rotation.setValue(transform->rotation.getValue());
02196         manipulator->translation.setValue(transform->translation.getValue());
02197         manipulator->scaleFactor.setValue(transform->scaleFactor.getValue());
02198         manipulator->scaleOrientation.setValue(transform->scaleOrientation.getValue());
02199         manipulator->center.setValue(transform->center.getValue());
02200 
02201         coinNode->setPart("transform", manipulator);
02202         ChangeSelection( currentIndex );
02203 
02204         SoDragger* dragger = manipulator->getDragger();
02205         dragger->addStartCallback (startManipulator, static_cast< void*>( this ) );
02206         dragger->addFinishCallback(finishManipulator, static_cast< void*>( this ) );
02207 
02208         m_document->SetDocumentModified( true );
02209 }

02370 void MainWindow::SoManip_to_SoTransform()
02371 {
02372         //Transform manipulator to a SoTransform
02373         QModelIndex currentIndex = sceneModelView->currentIndex();
02374 
02375         InstanceNode* instanceNode = m_sceneModel->NodeFromIndex(currentIndex);
02376         SoBaseKit* coinNode = static_cast< SoBaseKit* >( instanceNode->GetNode() );
02377         SoTransformManip* manipulator = static_cast< SoTransformManip* >( coinNode->getPart( "transform", false ) );
02378         if( !manipulator ) return;
02379 
02380         SoTransform* transform = new SoTransform;
02381         transform->rotation.setValue(manipulator->rotation.getValue());
02382         transform->translation.setValue(manipulator->translation.getValue());
02383         transform->scaleFactor.setValue(manipulator->scaleFactor.getValue());
02384         transform->scaleOrientation.setValue(manipulator->scaleOrientation.getValue());
02385         transform->center.setValue(manipulator->center.getValue());
02386 
02387         coinNode->setPart("transform", transform);
02388         ChangeSelection( currentIndex );
02389 
02390         m_document->SetDocumentModified( true );
02391 }
02392 
02393 void MainWindow::ChangeSelection( const QModelIndex& current )
02394 {
02395         InstanceNode* instanceSelected = m_sceneModel->NodeFromIndex( current );
02396     SoNode* selectedCoinNode = instanceSelected->GetNode();
02397 
02398     if (selectedCoinNode->getTypeId().isDerivedFrom( SoBaseKit::getClassTypeId() ) )
02399         {
02400                 SoBaseKit* selectedCoinNodeKit = static_cast< SoBaseKit* >( selectedCoinNode );
02401                 parametersView->SelectionChangedToKit( selectedCoinNodeKit);
02402         }
02403         else
02404         {
02405                 parametersView->SelectionChangedToPart(selectedCoinNode);
02406         }
02407 }

02410 
02411 
02417 void MainWindow::CreateMaterial( TMaterialFactory* pTMaterialFactory )
02418 {
02419         QModelIndex parentIndex = ( (! sceneModelView->currentIndex().isValid() ) || (sceneModelView->currentIndex() == sceneModelView->rootIndex() ) ) ?
02420                                                                 m_sceneModel->index( 0, 0, sceneModelView->rootIndex( )):
02421                                                                 sceneModelView->currentIndex();
02422 
02423         InstanceNode* parentInstance = m_sceneModel->NodeFromIndex( parentIndex );
02424         SoNode* parentNode = parentInstance->GetNode();
02425         if( !parentNode->getTypeId().isDerivedFrom( SoShapeKit::getClassTypeId() ) ) return;
02426 
02427         TShapeKit* shapeKit = static_cast< TShapeKit* >( parentNode );
02428         TMaterial* material = static_cast< TMaterial* >( shapeKit->getPart( "material", false ) );
02429 
02430     if ( material )
02431     {
02432         QMessageBox::information( this, "Tonatiuh Action",
02433                                   "This TShapeKit already contains a material node", 1);
02434             return;
02435     }
02436 
02437         material = pTMaterialFactory->CreateTMaterial();
02438     QString typeName = pTMaterialFactory->TMaterialName();
02439     material->setName( typeName.toStdString().c_str() );
02440 
02441     CmdInsertMaterial* createMaterial = new CmdInsertMaterial( shapeKit, material, m_sceneModel );
02442     QString commandText = QString( "Create Material: %1").arg( pTMaterialFactory->TMaterialName().toLatin1().constData() );
02443     createMaterial->setText(commandText);
02444     m_commandStack->push( createMaterial );
02445 
02446         m_sceneModel->UpdateSceneModel();
02447     m_document->SetDocumentModified( true );
02448 }
02449 
02459 void MainWindow::CreateShape( TShapeFactory* pTShapeFactory )
02460 {
02461     QModelIndex parentIndex = ((! sceneModelView->currentIndex().isValid() ) || (sceneModelView->currentIndex() == sceneModelView->rootIndex())) ?
02462                                                                 m_sceneModel->index (0,0,sceneModelView->rootIndex()) : sceneModelView->currentIndex();
02463 
02464         InstanceNode* parentInstance = m_sceneModel->NodeFromIndex( parentIndex );
02465         SoNode* parentNode = parentInstance->GetNode();
02466         if( !parentNode->getTypeId().isDerivedFrom( SoShapeKit::getClassTypeId() ) ) return;
02467 
02468         TShapeKit* shapeKit = static_cast< TShapeKit* >( parentNode );
02469         TShape* shape = static_cast< TShape* >( shapeKit->getPart( "shape", false ) );
02470 
02471     if (shape)
02472     {
02473         QMessageBox::information( this, "Tonatiuh Action",
02474                                   "This TShapeKit already contains a shape", 1);
02475     }
02476     else
02477     {
02478         shape = pTShapeFactory->CreateTShape();
02479         /*Hay que comprobar si shape es nulo para no crear una superficie a partir de nulo que probacara el cierre de la aplicacion.*/
02480         if(shape!=0){
02481         shape->setName( pTShapeFactory->TShapeName().toStdString().c_str() );
02482         CmdInsertShape* createShape = new CmdInsertShape( shapeKit, shape, m_sceneModel );
02483         QString commandText = QString( "Create Shape: %1" ).arg( pTShapeFactory->TShapeName().toLatin1().constData());
02484         createShape->setText( commandText );
02485         m_commandStack->push( createShape );
02486 
02487         m_sceneModel->UpdateSceneModel();
02488         m_document->SetDocumentModified( true );
02489         }
02490     }
02491 }
02492 
02493 
02494 void MainWindow::CreateTracker( TTrackerFactory* pTTrackerFactory )
02495 {
02496         QModelIndex parentIndex = ((! sceneModelView->currentIndex().isValid() ) || (sceneModelView->currentIndex() == sceneModelView->rootIndex())) ?
02497                                                                         m_sceneModel->index (0,0,sceneModelView->rootIndex()):
02498                                                                         sceneModelView->currentIndex();
02499 
02500         TSceneKit* scene = m_document->GetSceneKit();
02501 
02502         /*Las 2 lineas siguientes son para obtener el valor del nodo padre*/
02503         InstanceNode* parentInstance = m_sceneModel->NodeFromIndex( parentIndex );
02504         SoNode* parentNode = parentInstance->GetNode();
02505         /*Si el valor del nodo padre es del tipo TseparatorKit, permitimos la creacion del Traker**/
02506         if(parentNode->getTypeId().isDerivedFrom( TSeparatorKit::getClassTypeId() ) ){
02507         
02508                 TSeparatorKit* separatorKit = static_cast< TSeparatorKit* >( parentNode );
02509                 TTracker* trak = static_cast< TTracker* >( separatorKit->getPart( "tracker", false ) );
02510 
02511             if ( trak )
02512             {
02513                 QMessageBox::information( this, "Tonatiuh Action",
02514                                           "This TSeparatorKit already contains a tracker node", 1);
02515                     return;
02516             }
02517         TTracker* tracker = pTTrackerFactory->CreateTTracker( );
02518 
02519         tracker->SetSceneKit( scene );
02520         tracker->setName(pTTrackerFactory->TTrackerName().toStdString().c_str() );
02521         CmdInsertTracker* command = new CmdInsertTracker( tracker, parentIndex, scene, m_sceneModel );
02522         m_commandStack->push( command );
02523 
02524         m_sceneModel->UpdateSceneModel();
02525         m_document->SetDocumentModified( true );
02526         }
02527         /*En caso de que el valor del nodo padre no sea del tipo TSeparatorKit,
02528          *no realizamos ninguna modicacion en SceneModel*/
02529         else return;
02530         
02531 }
02532 
02533 void MainWindow::closeEvent( QCloseEvent* event )
02534 {
02535     if ( OkToContinue() )
02536     {
02537         WriteSettings();
02538         event->accept();
02539     }
02540     else event->ignore();
02541 }
02542 
02546 void MainWindow::mousePressEvent( QMouseEvent* e )
02547 {
02548         QPoint pos = e->pos();
02549         int x = pos.x();
02550         int y = pos.y()-64;
02551 
02552         QSplitter *pSplitter = findChild<QSplitter *>( "graphicHorizontalSplitter" );
02553         QRect mainViewRect = pSplitter->geometry();
02554 
02555         if( mainViewRect.contains( x, y ) )
02556         {
02557                 QSplitter *pvSplitter1 = findChild<QSplitter *>( "graphicVerticalSplitter1" );
02558                 QSplitter *pvSplitter2 = findChild<QSplitter *>( "graphicVerticalSplitter1" );
02559                 QRect vViewRect1 = pvSplitter1->geometry();
02560                 if(vViewRect1.contains(x,y))
02561                 {
02562                         QList<int> size(pvSplitter2->sizes());
02563                         if(x < size[0])
02564                                 m_focusView = 0;
02565                         if(x > size[0])
02566                                 m_focusView = 1;
02567                 }
02568                 else
02569                 {
02570                         QList<int> size(pvSplitter1->sizes());
02571                         if(x < size[0])
02572                                 m_focusView = 2;
02573                         if(x > size[0])
02574                                 m_focusView = 3;
02575                 }
02576         }
02577 }
02578 
02582 void MainWindow::ChangeModelScene()
02583 {
02584         TSceneKit* coinScene = m_document->GetSceneKit();
02585 
02586         m_sceneModel->SetCoinScene( *coinScene );
02587     m_graphicsRoot->AddModel( coinScene );
02588 
02589         QModelIndex viewRootNodeIndex = m_sceneModel->IndexFromNodeUrl( QString( "//SunNode" ) );
02590         InstanceNode* viewRootNode = m_sceneModel->NodeFromIndex( viewRootNodeIndex );
02591         sceneModelView->setRootIndex( viewRootNodeIndex );
02592 
02593         InstanceNode* concentratorRoot = viewRootNode->children[ 0 ];
02594 
02595         m_selectionModel->setCurrentIndex( m_sceneModel->IndexFromNodeUrl( concentratorRoot->GetNodeURL() ), QItemSelectionModel::ClearAndSelect );
02596 
02597 }
02598 
02602 void MainWindow::CalculateSunPosition()
02603 {
02604 #ifndef NO_MARBLE
02605 
02606         SoSceneKit* coinScene = m_document->GetSceneKit();
02607         if( !coinScene->getPart( "lightList[0]", false ) ) return;
02608 
02609         SunPositionCalculatorDialog sunposDialog;
02610         connect( &sunposDialog, SIGNAL( changeSunLight( double, double ) ) , this, SLOT( ChangeSunPosition( double, double ) ) );
02611 
02612         sunposDialog.exec();
02613 #endif /* NO_MARBLE*/
02614 
02615 }
02616 
02620 SoSeparator* MainWindow::CreateGrid( int xDimension, int zDimension, double xSpacing, double zSpacing )
02621 {
02622 
02623         double xWidth = xDimension * xSpacing;
02624         double zWidth = zDimension * zSpacing;
02625 
02626         int nVertex = xDimension * zDimension + 4;
02627     SbVec3f* vertex = new SbVec3f[nVertex];
02628 
02629     int nLines = xDimension + zDimension + 2;
02630     int* lines = new int[nLines];
02631 
02632 
02633     int vNum = 0;
02634     int lNum = 0;
02635     for( int xIndex = 0; xIndex <= xDimension; ++xIndex )
02636         {
02637                 double xValue = -( xWidth / 2  ) + xIndex * xSpacing;
02638                 vertex[vNum++].setValue( xValue, 0.0, zWidth/ 2 );
02639                 vertex[vNum++].setValue( xValue, 0.0, -zWidth/ 2 );
02640                 lines[lNum++] = 2;
02641         }
02642 
02643         vertex[vNum++].setValue( -xWidth / 2, 0.0, zWidth/ 2 );
02644         vertex[vNum++].setValue( xWidth / 2, 0.0, zWidth/ 2 );
02645     lines[lNum++] = 2;
02646         vertex[vNum++].setValue( -xWidth / 2, 0.0, -zWidth/ 2 );
02647         vertex[vNum++].setValue( xWidth / 2, 0.0, -zWidth/ 2 );
02648     lines[lNum++] = 2;
02649 
02650     for( int zIndex = 1; zIndex < zDimension; ++zIndex )
02651         {
02652                 double zValue = -( zWidth / 2  ) + zIndex * zSpacing;
02653                 vertex[vNum++].setValue( xWidth / 2 , 0.0, zValue );
02654                 vertex[vNum++].setValue( -xWidth / 2 , 0.0, zValue );
02655             lines[lNum++] = 2;
02656         }
02657 
02658 
02659         SoSeparator* grid = new SoSeparator;
02660 
02661         SoMaterial* mat = new SoMaterial;
02662         static float colors[2][3] = { {0.4f, 0.4f, 0.4f}, {0.6f, 0.6f, 0.6f} };
02663         mat->diffuseColor.setValues(0, 2, colors);
02664         grid->addChild(mat);
02665 
02666         SoCoordinate3* line_coords = new SoCoordinate3;
02667         line_coords->point.setValues(0, nVertex, vertex);
02668         grid->addChild(line_coords);
02669 
02670         SoLineSet* lineset=new SoLineSet;
02671         lineset->numVertices.setValues(0,lNum,lines);
02672         grid->addChild(lineset);
02673 
02674 
02675     delete[] vertex;
02676     delete[] lines;
02677         return grid;
02678 
02679 }
