02708 
02714 bool MainWindow::Delete( QModelIndex index )
02715 {
02716 
02717         if( !index.isValid()) return false;
02718         if( index == sceneModelView->rootIndex() ) return false;
02719         if( index.parent() == sceneModelView->rootIndex() ) return false;
02720 
02721         InstanceNode* instanceNode = m_sceneModel->NodeFromIndex( index );
02722         SoNode* coinNode = instanceNode->GetNode();
02723 
02724         if( coinNode->getTypeId().isDerivedFrom( TTracker::getClassTypeId() ) )
02725         {
02726                 CmdDeleteTracker* commandDelete = new CmdDeleteTracker( index, m_document->GetSceneKit(), *m_sceneModel );
02727                 m_commandStack->push( commandDelete );
02728         }
02729         else if( coinNode->getTypeId().isDerivedFrom( TLightKit::getClassTypeId() ) ) return false;
02730         else
02731         {
02732                 CmdDelete* commandDelete = new CmdDelete( index, *m_sceneModel );
02733 
02734                 m_commandStack->push( commandDelete );
02735         }
02736 
02737 
02738         m_sceneModel->UpdateSceneModel();
02739         m_document->SetDocumentModified( true );
02740 
02741         return true;
02742 }
02743 
02747 QSplitter* MainWindow::GetHorizontalSplitterPointer()
02748 {
02749     QSplitter* pSplitter = findChild< QSplitter* >( "horizontalSplitter" );
02750     if( !pSplitter ) tgf::SevereError( "MainWindow::GetSceneModelViewPointer: splitter not found" );
02751     return pSplitter;
02752 }
02753 
02758 bool MainWindow::OkToContinue()
02759 {
02760         if ( m_document->IsModified() )
02761         {
02762                 int answer = QMessageBox::warning( this, tr( "Tonatiuh" ),
02763                                  tr( "The document has been modified.\n"
02764                                      "Do you want to save your changes?"),
02765                                  QMessageBox::Yes | QMessageBox::Default,
02766                                  QMessageBox::No,
02767                                  QMessageBox::Cancel | QMessageBox::Escape );
02768 
02769                 if ( answer == QMessageBox::Yes ) return Save();
02770                 else if ( answer == QMessageBox::Cancel ) return false;
02771         }
02772         return true;
02773 }
02774 
02781 bool MainWindow::Paste( QModelIndex nodeIndex, tgc::PasteType type )
02782 {
02783         if( !nodeIndex.isValid() ) return false;
02784         if( !m_coinNode_Buffer ) return false;
02785 
02786         InstanceNode* ancestor = m_sceneModel->NodeFromIndex( nodeIndex );
02787         SoNode* selectedCoinNode = ancestor->GetNode();
02788 
02789         if ( !selectedCoinNode->getTypeId().isDerivedFrom( SoBaseKit::getClassTypeId() ) ) return false;
02790         if ( ( selectedCoinNode->getTypeId().isDerivedFrom( TShapeKit::getClassTypeId() ) ) &&
02791         ( m_coinNode_Buffer->getTypeId().isDerivedFrom( SoBaseKit::getClassTypeId() ) ) )       return false;
02792 
02793         if( ancestor->GetNode() == m_coinNode_Buffer)  return false;
02794         while( ancestor->GetParent() )
02795         {
02796                 if(ancestor->GetParent()->GetNode() == m_coinNode_Buffer )      return false;
02797                 ancestor = ancestor->GetParent();
02798         }
02799 
02800         CmdPaste* commandPaste = new CmdPaste( type, m_selectionModel->currentIndex(), m_coinNode_Buffer, *m_sceneModel );
02801         m_commandStack->push( commandPaste );
02802 
02803         m_sceneModel->UpdateSceneModel();
02804         m_document->SetDocumentModified( true );
02805         return true;
02806 
02807 }
02808 
02812 QDir MainWindow::PluginDirectory()
02813 {
02814         // Returns the path to the top level plug-in directory.
02815         // It is assumed that this is a subdirectory named "plugins" of the directory in
02816         // which the running version of Tonatiuh is located.
02817 
02818     QDir directory( qApp->applicationDirPath() );
02819         directory.cd( "plugins" );
02820         return directory;
02821 }

02826 void MainWindow::ReadSettings()
02827 {
02828     QSettings settings( "NREL UTB CENER", "Tonatiuh" );
02829     QRect rect = settings.value( "geometry", QRect(200, 200, 400, 400 ) ).toRect();
02830     move( rect.topLeft() );
02831     resize( rect.size() );
02832 
02833     setWindowState( Qt::WindowNoState );
02834     if( settings.value( "windowNoState", false ).toBool() )     setWindowState( windowState() ^ Qt::WindowNoState );
02835     if( settings.value( "windowMinimized", false ).toBool() )   setWindowState( windowState() ^ Qt::WindowMinimized );
02836     if( settings.value( "windowMaximized", true ).toBool() )    setWindowState( windowState() ^ Qt::WindowMaximized );
02837     if( settings.value( "windowFullScreen", false ).toBool() )  setWindowState( windowState() ^ Qt::WindowFullScreen );
02838     if( settings.value( "windowActive", false ).toBool() )      setWindowState( windowState() ^ Qt::WindowActive );
02839     m_recentFiles = settings.value( "recentFiles" ).toStringList();
02840     UpdateRecentFileActions();
02841 
02842 }
02843 
02847 bool MainWindow::ReadyForRaytracing( InstanceNode*& rootSeparatorInstance,
02848                                                                         InstanceNode*& lightInstance,
02849                                                                         SoTransform*& lightTransform,
02850                                                                         TSunShape*& sunShape,
02851                                                                         TLightShape*& raycastingShape,
02852                                                                         TTransmissivity*& transmissivity )
02853 {
02854 
02855         //Check if there is a scene
02856         TSceneKit* coinScene = m_document->GetSceneKit();
02857         if ( !coinScene )  return false;
02858 
02859         //Check if there is a transmissivity defined
02860         if ( !coinScene->getPart( "transmissivity", false ) )   transmissivity = 0;
02861         else
02862                 transmissivity = static_cast< TTransmissivity* > ( coinScene->getPart( "transmissivity", false ) );
02863 
02864         //Check if there is a rootSeparator InstanceNode
02865         rootSeparatorInstance = m_sceneModel->NodeFromIndex( sceneModelView->rootIndex() );
02866         if( !rootSeparatorInstance ) return false;
02867 
02868         InstanceNode* sceneInstance = rootSeparatorInstance->GetParent();
02869         if ( !sceneInstance )  return false;
02870 
02871         //Check if there is a light and is properly configured
02872         if ( !coinScene->getPart( "lightList[0]", false ) )     return false;
02873         TLightKit* lightKit = static_cast< TLightKit* >( coinScene->getPart( "lightList[0]", false ) );
02874 
02875         lightInstance = sceneInstance->children[0];
02876         if ( !lightInstance ) return false;
02877 
02878         if( !lightKit->getPart( "tsunshape", false ) ) return false;
02879         sunShape = static_cast< TSunShape * >( lightKit->getPart( "tsunshape", false ) );
02880 
02881         if( !lightKit->getPart( "icon", false ) ) return false;
02882         raycastingShape = static_cast< TLightShape * >( lightKit->getPart( "icon", false ) );
02883 
02884         if( !lightKit->getPart( "transform" ,false ) ) return false;
02885         lightTransform = static_cast< SoTransform * >( lightKit->getPart( "transform" ,false ) );
02886 
02887 
02888         QVector< RandomDeviateFactory* > randomDeviateFactoryList = m_pluginManager->GetRandomDeviateFactories();
02889         QVector< TPhotonMapFactory* > photonmapFactoryList = m_pluginManager->GetPhotonMapFactories();
02890 
02891         //Check if there is a random generator selected;
02892         if( m_selectedRandomDeviate == -1 )
02893         {
02894                 if( randomDeviateFactoryList.size() > 0 ) m_selectedRandomDeviate = 0;
02895                 else    return false;
02896         }
02897 
02898         //Create the random generator
02899         if( !m_rand )   m_rand =  randomDeviateFactoryList[m_selectedRandomDeviate]->CreateRandomDeviate();
02900 
02901         //Check if there is a photon map type selected;
02902         if( m_selectedPhotonMap == -1 )
02903         {
02904                 if( photonmapFactoryList.size() > 0 ) m_selectedPhotonMap = 0;
02905                 else    return false;
02906         }
02907 
02908         //Create the photon map where photons are going to be stored
02909         if( !m_increasePhotonMap )
02910         {
02911                 delete m_photonMap;
02912                 m_photonMap = 0;
02913         }
02914 
02915         if( !m_photonMap )
02916         {
02917                 QVector< TPhotonMapFactory* > photonmapFactoryList = m_pluginManager->GetPhotonMapFactories();
02918 
02919                 m_photonMap = photonmapFactoryList[m_selectedPhotonMap]->CreateTPhotonMap();
02920                 m_tracedRays = 0;
02921         }
02922 
02923 
02924         return true;
02925 }
02926 
02932 bool MainWindow::SaveFile( const QString& fileName )
02933 {
02934         if( !m_document->WriteFile( fileName ) )
02935         {
02936                 statusBar()->showMessage( tr( "Saving canceled" ), 2000 );
02937                 return false;
02938         }
02939 
02940         SetCurrentFile( fileName );
02941         statusBar()->showMessage( tr( "File saved" ), 2000 );
02942         return true;
02943 }
02944 
02948 void MainWindow::SetCurrentFile( const QString& fileName )
02949 {
02950         m_currentFile = fileName;
02951         m_document->SetDocumentModified( false );
02952 
02953         QString shownName = "Untitled";
02954         if ( !m_currentFile.isEmpty() )
02955         {
02956                 shownName = StrippedName( m_currentFile );
02957                 m_recentFiles.removeAll( m_currentFile );
02958                 m_recentFiles.prepend( m_currentFile );
02959                 UpdateRecentFileActions();
02960         }
02961 
02962         setWindowTitle( tr( "%1[*] - %2" ).arg( shownName ).arg( tr( "Tonatiuh" ) ) );
02963 }

02968 void MainWindow::SetupActions()
02969 {
02970     m_recentFileActions = new QAction*[m_maxRecentFiles];
02971     for ( int i = 0; i < m_maxRecentFiles; ++i )
02972     {
02973         m_recentFileActions[i] = new QAction( this );
02974         m_recentFileActions[i]->setVisible( false );
02975         connect( m_recentFileActions[i], SIGNAL( triggered() ),
02976                                            this, SLOT( OpenRecentFile() ) );
02977     }
02978 }

02980 void MainWindow::SetupActionsInsertMaterial()
02981 {
02982         QVector< TMaterialFactory* > materialsFactoryList = m_pluginManager->GetMaterialFactories();
02983         if( !( materialsFactoryList.size() > 0 ) )      return;
02984 
02985         QMenu* pMaterialsMenu = menuInsert->findChild< QMenu* >( "menuMaterial" );
02986         if( !pMaterialsMenu ) return;

02988         {
02989                 //Enable material menu
02990                 pMaterialsMenu->setEnabled( true );
02991                 m_materialsToolBar = CreateMaterialsTooBar( pMaterialsMenu );
02992         }

02995         {
02996                 TMaterialFactory* pTMaterialFactory = materialsFactoryList[i];
02997

02999             actionInsertMaterial->setIcon( pTMaterialFactory->TMaterialIcon() );
03000 
03001             pMaterialsMenu->addAction( actionInsertMaterial );
03002                 m_materialsToolBar->addAction( actionInsertMaterial );
03003                 m_materialsToolBar->addSeparator();
03004             connect( actionInsertMaterial, SIGNAL( triggered() ),
03005                          actionInsertMaterial, SLOT( OnActionInsertMaterialTriggered() ) );
03006                 connect( actionInsertMaterial, SIGNAL( CreateMaterial( TMaterialFactory* ) ),
03007                                                  this, SLOT( CreateMaterial( TMaterialFactory* ) ) );
03008 
03009         }
03010 
03011 }

03196 void MainWindow::SetupGraphicView()
03197 {
03198         //SetupGraphcisRoot();
03199 
03200         QSplitter* pSplitter = findChild<QSplitter *>( "horizontalSplitter" );
03201 
03202         QSplitter* graphicHorizontalSplitter = new QSplitter();
03203         graphicHorizontalSplitter->setObjectName( QString::fromUtf8("graphicHorizontalSplitter") );
03204     graphicHorizontalSplitter->setOrientation( Qt::Vertical );
03205     pSplitter->insertWidget( 0, graphicHorizontalSplitter );
03206 
03207         QList<int> sizes;
03208     sizes<<500<<200;
03209     pSplitter->setSizes ( sizes );
03210 
03211 
03212     QSplitter *graphicVerticalSplitter1 = new QSplitter();
03213     graphicVerticalSplitter1->setObjectName( QString::fromUtf8( "graphicVerticalSplitter1" ) );
03214     graphicVerticalSplitter1->setOrientation( Qt::Horizontal );
03215     graphicHorizontalSplitter->insertWidget( 0, graphicVerticalSplitter1 );
03216 
03217     QSplitter *graphicVerticalSplitter2 = new QSplitter();
03218     graphicVerticalSplitter2->setObjectName(QString::fromUtf8("graphicVerticalSplitter2"));
03219     graphicVerticalSplitter2->setOrientation(Qt::Horizontal);
03220     graphicHorizontalSplitter->insertWidget( 1, graphicVerticalSplitter2 );
03221 
03222     QList<int> height;
03223     height<<200<<200;
03224     graphicHorizontalSplitter->setSizes ( height );
03225 
03226     GraphicView* graphicView1 = new GraphicView(graphicVerticalSplitter1);
03227     graphicView1->setObjectName(QString::fromUtf8("graphicView1"));
03228     m_graphicView.push_back(graphicView1);
03229     GraphicView* graphicView2 = new GraphicView(graphicVerticalSplitter1);
03230     graphicView2->setObjectName(QString::fromUtf8("graphicView2"));
03231         m_graphicView.push_back(graphicView2);
03232     GraphicView* graphicView3 = new GraphicView(graphicVerticalSplitter2);
03233     graphicView3->setObjectName(QString::fromUtf8("graphicView3"));
03234         m_graphicView.push_back(graphicView3);
03235     GraphicView* graphicView4 = new GraphicView(graphicVerticalSplitter2);
03236     graphicView4->setObjectName(QString::fromUtf8("graphicView4"));
03237         m_graphicView.push_back(graphicView4);
03238 
03239     graphicVerticalSplitter1->addWidget(m_graphicView[0]);
03240     graphicVerticalSplitter1->addWidget(m_graphicView[1]);
03241     graphicVerticalSplitter2->addWidget(m_graphicView[2]);
03242     graphicVerticalSplitter2->addWidget(m_graphicView[3]);
03243 
03244     QList<int> widthSizes;
03245     widthSizes<<100<<100;
03246     graphicVerticalSplitter1->setSizes ( widthSizes );
03247     graphicVerticalSplitter2->setSizes ( widthSizes );
03248 
03249     if( graphicVerticalSplitter1 && graphicVerticalSplitter2 )
03250         {
03251                 m_graphicView[0] = graphicVerticalSplitter1->findChild< GraphicView* >( "graphicView1" );
03252         if ( m_graphicView[0] != NULL )
03253         {
03254             m_graphicView[0]->resize( 600, 400 );
03255             m_graphicView[0]->SetSceneGraph( m_graphicsRoot );
03256             m_graphicView[0]->setModel( m_sceneModel );
03257             m_graphicView[0]->setSelectionModel( m_selectionModel );
03258         }
03259                 else tgf::SevereError( "MainWindow::InitializeGraphicView: graphicView[0] not found" );
03260 
03261                 if ( m_graphicView[1] != NULL )
03262         {
03263             m_graphicView[1]->resize( 600, 400 );
03264             m_graphicView[1]->SetSceneGraph( m_graphicsRoot );
03265             m_graphicView[1]->setModel( m_sceneModel );
03266             m_graphicView[1]->setSelectionModel( m_selectionModel );
03267             m_focusView=1;
03268             on_action_X_Y_Plane_triggered();
03269         }
03270         else tgf::SevereError( "MainWindow::InitializeGraphicView: graphicView[1] not found" );
03271 
03272                 m_graphicView[2] = graphicVerticalSplitter2->findChild< GraphicView* >( "graphicView3" );
03273         if ( m_graphicView[2] != NULL )
03274         {
03275             m_graphicView[2]->resize( 600, 400 );
03276             m_graphicView[2]->SetSceneGraph( m_graphicsRoot );
03277             m_graphicView[2]->setModel( m_sceneModel );
03278             m_graphicView[2]->setSelectionModel( m_selectionModel );
03279             m_focusView=2;
03280             on_action_Y_Z_Plane_triggered();
03281         }
03282         else tgf::SevereError( "MainWindow::InitializeGraphicView: graphicView[2] not found" );
03283 
03284         m_graphicView[3] = graphicVerticalSplitter2->findChild< GraphicView* >( "graphicView4" );
03285         if ( m_graphicView[3] !=  NULL )
03286         {
03287             m_graphicView[3]->resize( 600, 400 );
03288             m_graphicView[3]->SetSceneGraph( m_graphicsRoot );
03289             m_graphicView[3]->setModel( m_sceneModel );
03290             m_graphicView[3]->setSelectionModel( m_selectionModel );
03291             m_focusView=3;
03292             on_action_X_Z_Plane_triggered();
03293         }
03294             else tgf::SevereError( "MainWindow::InitializeGraphicView: graphicView[3] not found" );
03295     }
03296         else tgf::SevereError( "MainWindow::InitializeGraphicView: verticalSplitter not found" );
03297 
03298         m_graphicView[1]->hide();
03299         m_graphicView[2]->hide();
03300         m_graphicView[3]->hide();
03301         m_focusView = 0;
03302 }

03310           menuRecent->addAction( m_recentFileActions[i] );

03447 void MainWindow::ShowRaysIn3DView()
03448 {
03449         actionDisplayRays->setEnabled( false );
03450         actionDisplayRays->setChecked( false );
03451 
03452 
03453         if( m_tracedRays > 0.0 && ( m_fraction > 0.0 || m_drawPhotons ) )
03454         {
03455                 SoSeparator* rays = new SoSeparator;
03456                 rays->ref();
03457                 rays->setName( "Rays" );
03458 
03459                 if( m_drawPhotons )
03460                 {
03461                         SoSeparator* points = trf::DrawPhotonMapPoints(*m_photonMap);
03462                         rays->addChild(points);
03463                 }
03464                 if( m_fraction > 0.0 )
03465                 {
03466                         SoSeparator* currentRays = trf::DrawPhotonMapRays(*m_photonMap, m_tracedRays, m_fraction );
03467                         if( currentRays )       rays->addChild(currentRays);
03468 
03469                 }
03470                 m_graphicsRoot->AddRays( rays );
03471 
03472                 actionDisplayRays->setEnabled( true );
03473                 actionDisplayRays->setChecked( true );
03474         }
03475 }

03481 bool MainWindow::StartOver( const QString& fileName )
03482 {
03483         InstanceNode* sceneInstance = m_sceneModel->NodeFromIndex( sceneModelView->rootIndex() );
03484         InstanceNode* concentratorRoot = sceneInstance->children[ sceneInstance->children.size() -1 ];
03485         m_selectionModel->setCurrentIndex( m_sceneModel->IndexFromNodeUrl( concentratorRoot->GetNodeURL() ), QItemSelectionModel::ClearAndSelect );
03486 
03487         actionDisplayRays->setEnabled( false );
03488         actionDisplayRays->setChecked( false );
03489 
03490         m_graphicsRoot->RemoveRays();
03491         m_graphicsRoot->RemoveModel();
03492 
03493         m_commandStack->clear();
03494         m_sceneModel->Clear();
03495 
03496         SetSunPositionCalculatorEnabled( 0 );
03497 
03498         QStatusBar* statusbar = new QStatusBar;
03499         setStatusBar( statusbar );
03500 
03501         if( !fileName.isEmpty() && m_document->ReadFile( fileName ) )
03502         {
03503                 statusbar->showMessage( tr( "File loaded" ), 2000 );
03504             SetCurrentFile( fileName );
03505         }
03506         else
03507         {
03508                 m_document->New();
03509             statusbar->showMessage( tr( "New file" ), 2000 );
03510 
03511             SetCurrentFile( "" );
03512         }
03513 
03514     ChangeModelScene();
03515 
03516 
03517    /*if( fileName.isEmpty() )
03518     {
03519         m_document->New();
03520         statusbar->showMessage( tr( "New file" ), 2000 );
03521     }
03522     else
03523     {
03524         if( !m_document->ReadFile( fileName ) )
03525                 {
03526                         statusBar()->showMessage( tr( "Loading canceled" ), 2000 );
03527                         return false;
03528                 }
03529        statusbar->showMessage( tr( "File loaded" ), 2000 );
03530     }
03531 
03532     SetCurrentFile( fileName );
03533 
03534     ChangeModelScene();*/
03535 
03536         m_sceneModel->DisplayAnalyzeResults();
03537 
03538     return true;
03539 }

03544 QString MainWindow::StrippedName( const QString& fullFileName )
03545 {
03546         return QFileInfo( fullFileName ).fileName();
03547 }
03548 
03552 void MainWindow::UpdateRecentFileActions()
03553 {
03554         QMutableStringListIterator iterator( m_recentFiles );
03555         while ( iterator.hasNext() )
03556         {
03557                 if ( !QFile::exists( iterator.next() ) ) iterator.remove();
03558         }
03559 
03560         for ( int j = 0; j < m_maxRecentFiles; ++j )
03561         {
03562                 if ( j < m_recentFiles.count() )
03563                 {
03564                         QString text = tr( "&%1 %2" )
03565                                        .arg( j + 1 )
03566                                        .arg( StrippedName( m_recentFiles[j] ) );
03567                         m_recentFileActions[j]->setText( text );
03568                         m_recentFileActions[j]->setData( m_recentFiles[j] );
03569                         m_recentFileActions[j]->setVisible( true );
03570                 }
03571                 else m_recentFileActions[j]->setVisible( false );
03572         }
03573 }
03574 
03578 void MainWindow::WriteSettings()
03579 {
03580         QSettings settings( "NREL UTB CENER", "Tonatiuh" );
03581         settings.setValue( "geometry", geometry() );
03582 
03583         Qt::WindowStates states = windowState();
03584         if( states.testFlag( Qt::WindowNoState ) )      settings.setValue( "windowNoState", true );
03585         else    settings.setValue( "windowNoState", false );
03586         if( states.testFlag( Qt::WindowMinimized ) )    settings.setValue( "windowMinimized", true );
03587         else    settings.setValue( "windowMinimized", false );
03588         if( states.testFlag( Qt::WindowMaximized ) )    settings.setValue( "windowMaximized", true );
03589         else    settings.setValue( "windowMaximized", false );
03590         if( states.testFlag( Qt::WindowFullScreen ) )   settings.setValue( "windowFullScreen", true );
03591         else    settings.setValue( "windowFullScreen", false );
03592         if( states.testFlag( Qt::WindowActive ) )       settings.setValue( "windowActive", true );
03593         else    settings.setValue( "windowActive", false );
03594 
03595     settings.setValue( "recentFiles", m_recentFiles );
03596 }
